-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://blockpulsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/blockpulsecontainer/gold/dim_date/part-00003-968c12b4-7ef6-403a-954b-f58bcf7eddf7-c000.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS date_dimension_table
